sen.j: 黄泉軍（よもついくさ）は、日本神話において黄泉に棲むとされる鬼達。
sen.e: Yomotsuikusa were demons in the Japanese Mythology, which were said to be living in the land of the dead.

sen.j: イザナギが黄泉の国の住人となったイザナミを見て逃げ出した時、イザナミは怒って1500人もの黄泉軍を放った。
sen.e: When Izanagi (The Male Who Invites) fled at the appearance of Izanami (The Female Who Invites), who had became an inhabitant of the land of the dead, Izanami grew angry and set the Yomotsuikusa consisting of 1500 demons at him.

sen.e: Izanagi, arriving at the starting point of Yomotsu Hirasaka (the slope that leads to the land of the dead), which situated at the border between the land of dead and the land of the living, picked three peaches from the peach tree growing there.
